column4: can someone help me, I was partitioning in pmagic in dos and it froze partitioning my boot partition, now I need to fix the partition so it works again
is anyone there who can help
well I already asked my question
I was partitioning my windows ntfs partition in pmagic in dos and it froze, now it doesn't boot
there is errors with the partition
what application can I use to fix the partition
: i didnt see , i am not shure many can, i dont think this is the apropriate chanel..
I'm booted in ubuntu on cd
there is no application to fix a corrupted ntfs partition in linux?
I'm 99.9% sure there are about 101 applications that I could slap all on one boot disc and recover the partition with, most of which run on dos
but you're telling me there isn't something equivalent to chkdsk in linux?
, i would try googling instead of irc for such a problem...
